description.narrative: Access to staple food: Xiang Nian provides sustainable supply of affordable staple food to China's rural populations in inland provinces. Dried noodles are considered healthier alternatives to instant noodles, while Xiang Nian's dried noodle products are especially preferred due to their higher nutritional content and no addition of chemical additives. Direct Job creation: Xiang Nian currently has 770 employees; with the planned capex, the number is expected to grow to 1,000 by 2022.

table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } Established in 1998, Xiang Nian (XN) is a manufacturer specialized in the research, development and production of dried noodles. Upon completion of the Project, XNs total production capacity would increase from 100,000 tons to 200,000 tons of dry noodles per annum.

mailing-address.narrative: Contact Person: Mr. Wang Xuelong Company Name: Henan Xiang Nian Foods Co. Ltd Address: Longshen Ave. Longshen Industry Park, Nanyang City, Henan Province, China Email: wxuelong@163.com Phone: +86 13948386290

name.narrative: table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } XN is located in the city of Nanyang, Henan province, a frontier region in China where almost half of the population is engaged in agricultural activities.
